A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Plot was not so good\, new major characters are poorly developed and heck there a lot of characters that were in there just for the sake of being there. Not all bad tho\, stellar performence by Oscar Isaac and Mark Hamill.\n\nRogue One did A LOT better than this film. If you liked that\, you might be better off not watching this until episode 9 sorts out all these sloppy plot loose ends that this movie has created.
